From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>



* BrightBlade looked up at Lightmare as she saw the bot smile down at her 
and smiled back, her voice as sweet as cherry pie.*

" Just try it, Glue Pot, and you'll have a blaster shoved so far up your 
skid-plate you'll be shootin lasers out of your nose for months."

* She then widened her smile and then turned back to watch the fight but 
then she suddenly remembered that Gangon had said that he no longer followed 
Hell Beast's command, she looked over at him.*

" You can't be serious? Hell Beast is our Lord, what he says goes...you know 
that."

* She then winked at him just because, but mainly for the reason that he had 
actually called her "baby". It was a new word to her since Gangon just 
usually called her beautiful or something like that, compliments could go a 
long way if she was in a good mood.
But she also knew that if she didn't watch her back then she wouldn't have 
any future at all, if Lightmare had her way anyway.*
